mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATED_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME from USER where USER_NAME = #{userName} or EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into USER (USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATED_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME) VALUES (#{user.userName}, #{user.password}, #{user.email}, #{user.createdTime}, #{user.lastLoginTime})
